elements.name: Users can login to the application with valid credentials and

steps.name: User is already logged in to the application and verify the user information on the landing page
User should be able to select "Jupiter All-Weather Trainer" jacket from the men module
Verify the jacket name on the "Jupiter All-Weather Trainer" list
User should be able to select the "M" and "Blue" and "1"then click on the add to cart
User should be able to click on the cart and checkout

steps.name: User should be able to enter the shipping details and click on the Next
User should be able to verify the shipping address and place the order
User should be able to verify the order number and get text on the screen "Thank you for your purchase!"

name: Users with valid credentials can purchase the men jacket
description:
